result.eng: She runs in the park every morning.
result.ga: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidin
result.orig: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidin
result.html: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidinShe runs in the park every morning.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sí ag riṫ sa ṗáirc gaċ maidinShe runs in the park every morning.

result.eng: The river runs through the city.
result.ga: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathair
result.orig: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathair
result.html: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathairThe river runs through the city.
result.ponchtml: Riṫeann an aḃainn tríd an ċaṫairThe river runs through the city.

result.eng: She runs a mile every day.
result.html: Ritheann sí míle gach láShe runs a mile every day.
result.ponchtml: Riṫeann sí míle gaċ láShe runs a mile every day.
